```{r}
nfhs5_hh_wash %>%
  mutate(age_group=case_when(hv220<=18~"Child",
                             hv220>18 & hv220<=30~"Young",
                             hv220>30 & hv220<=50~"Adult",
                             hv220>50~"Sneior"))%>%
  crosstab(y=hv217,x=age_group,weight=hv005/100)
  
```

```{r}
write.csv(nfhs6_hh_wash %>%
  mutate(car_ownership=case_when(hv210==1 & hv211==0 & hv212==0~"Only Bicycle",
                                 hv210==0 & hv211==0 & hv212==0~"No Vehicle",
                                 hv211==1 & hv212==0~"Motor Cycle",
                                 hv212==1~"Car"))%>%
  crosstab(x=hv024,y=car_ownership,weight = shweight),"nfhs6_transport.csv",row.names = FALSE)

```
